author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 303 polling stations out of 3973 booths, to be set up in the 11 Assembly Constituencies in Kancheepuram district are identified as the booths where additional care to be taken for the smooth conduct of the elections.

According to a press release, three polling booths, one each in Chengalpattu, Tiruporur and Madurantakam have been classified as critical and the remaining 300 booths spread over the 10 Assembly segments were identified as vulnerable polling stations. While Pallavaram Constituency topped the list of vulnerable polling stations with 78, Sriperumpudur came last with four polling booths.
title: Little over 300 booths identified as vulnerable
